character_count.description: The count of characters in the text

word_count.description: The count of words in the text

method_count.description: The count of methods used in the text

mean_method_size.description: The average size of methods used in the text

mean_paragraph_size.description: The average size of paragraphs in the text

size_largest_method.description: The size of the largest method used in the text

size_shortest_method.description: The size of the shortest method used in the text

std_method_size.description: The standard deviation of the size of methods used in the text

step_count.description: The count of steps in the text

mean_steps_per_method.description: The average number of steps per method in the text

introduction_size.description: The size of the introduction in the text

summary_size.description: The size of the summary in the text

references_count.description: The count of references in the text

references_count_per_text_length.description: The count of references per text length

references_count_per_method.description: The count of references per method

image_count.description: The count of images in the text

image_count_per_method.description: The count of images per method

num_votes.description: The number of votes the text received

is_expert.description: Whether the author is an expert or not (1 for expert, 0 for not expert)

value_dict.0: The author is not an expert

views.description: The number of views the text received

co_authors.description: The number of co-authors of the text

warnings.description: The number of warnings in the text

tips.description: The number of tips in the text

to_be_verb.description: The count of "to be" verbs in the text

aux_verb.description: The count of auxiliary verbs in the text

conjunction.description: The count of conjunctions in the text

pronoun.description: The count of pronouns in the text

preposition.description: The count of prepositions in the text

nominalization.description: The count of nominalizations in the text

sentence_beginning_pronoun.description: The count of sentences beginning with a pronoun

sentence_beginning_interrogative.description: The count of sentences beginning with an interrogative word

sentence_beginning_article.description: The count of sentences beginning with an article

sentence_beginning_subordination.description: The count of sentences beginning with a subordination

sentence_beginning_conjunction.description: The count of sentences beginning with a conjunction

sentence_beginning_preposition.description: The count of sentences beginning with a preposition

Kincaid.description: The Kincaid readability score of the text

ARI.description: The Automated Readability Index of the text

Coleman_Liau.description: The Coleman Liau index of the text

FleschReadingEase.description: The Flesch Reading Ease score of the text

GunningFogIndex.description: The Gunning Fog Index of the text

LIX.description: The LIX readability score of the text

SMOGIndex.description: The SMOG Index of the text

RIX.description: The RIX readability score of the text

DaleChallIndex.description: The Dale Chall Readability score of the text

percent_helpful.description: The percentage of helpful votes the text received

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in text analysis and prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the text, please predict the helpfulness percentage of the text.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted helpfulness percentage of the text is [%].

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in text analysis and prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the text, please predict the number of views the text will receive.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted number of views for the text is [%].

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in text analysis and prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the text, please predict the number of votes the text will receive.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted number of votes for the text is [%].

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in text analysis and prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the text, please predict whether the author is an expert or not.
prompt.answer_prompt: The author is an expert[1] or not an expert[0]?

class_value_dict.0: The author is not an expert
